forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 48F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 34F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
